metadata.title: CVE-2022-3411 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: A lack of length validation in GitLab CE/EE affecting all versions from12.4 before 15.6.7, 15.7 before 15.7.6, and 15.8 before 15.8.1 allows anauthenticated attacker to create a large Issue description via GraphQLwhich, when repeatedly requested, saturates CPU usage.

criterions.comment: gitlab: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
